# SensoryFeedback.ReleaseFeedback

**Structure**

Feedback that can be played in response to a release (touch up) of a control.

## Declaration

```swift
struct ReleaseFeedback
```

## Type Properties

- **slider**: Indicates that a slider’s thumb has been released (touch up).

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
